rows.label: qev087404_MSG0001
rows.name:
You're a lifesaver!
Now we can repair the Doll's armor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yes[ST:wide ]—Saying he had other things to do,
that he was busy[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0006
rows.name:
After Tatsu went to all the trouble
of gathering the materials-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0007
rows.name: Tatsu wanted him to praise Tatsu wholeheartedly-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0010
rows.name: Ah, also, he did leave a message for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0011
rows.name:
"I'll show you how I work at night too, so find me."
[ST:wide ]—That's it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0013
rows.name: Tatsu wants to go home and sleep-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087404_MSG0014
rows.name:
Don't say that.
We've come this far, let's just see it through.[ST:wait ]
